pullRequest.title: [1.2.x] Add support for map -> record assignment
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose

This PR adds support for assigning compatible map values to record typed variables.
Fixes #17202

Samples
import ballerina/io;

public function main() {
    map<string> m = {"a":"aaa", "b":"bbb"};
    record {| string...; |} r = m;

    io:println(r);
} 
Remarks

Came across #22276 while writing tests for this.
